map.title: Knowledge Map
map.subtitle: A complete overview of all categories, subcategories, and topics

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your preferences at any time.
banner.closeWarning: Closing without making a choice will reject all non-essential cookies.

settings.title: Cookie Preferences
settings.description: Choose which cookies you want to allow. You can change these settings at any time from the footer.
settings.closeWarning: Closing without saving will be treated as rejecting all non-essential cookies.

necessary.name: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

functional.name: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies remember your preferences and settings, such as language selection and theme, to provide you with a more personalized experience.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website by collecting and reporting anonymous information. This helps us improve the website's performance and user experience.

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites and display personalized advertisements. They help us measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: This page could not be found.

meta.title: Spiritual Guides | Oxyness
meta.description: Explore spiritual and esoteric guides across Absolute, Metaphysics, Spirituality, and Esotericism. Discover practices, philosophies, and traditions.

hero.title: Explore Spiritual Guides
hero.description: Dive deep into the world of spirituality, metaphysics, and esoteric wisdom. Browse through our comprehensive collection of guides organized by category.

hub.title: Explore Spiritual Guides

translations.name: Energy Healing
translations.description: Understanding subtle energies and techniques for healing including Reiki, pranic healing, and crystal therapy.

data.subCategoryDescription: Understanding subtle energies and techniques for healing including Reiki, pranic healing, and crystal therapy.

translations.name: Reiki
translations.description: Japanese energy healing technique using universal life force energy for healing and balance.

translations.name: Pránanadi
translations.description: Ancient energy healing system working with the subtle body and pranic channels.

translations.name: Kinesiology
translations.description: Muscle testing and energy balancing techniques for holistic health assessment and healing.

translations.name: Chakra Balancing
translations.description: Working with the seven main energy centers to restore harmony and vitality.

translations.name: Crystal Healing
translations.description: Using the vibrational properties of crystals and gemstones for healing and transformation.

translations.name: Sound Healing
translations.description: Therapeutic use of sound frequencies, singing bowls, and toning for healing and balance.

translations.name: Healing Touch
translations.description: Biofield therapy using gentle touch and energy work to support healing and well-being.

translations.name: Tai Chi Energetics
translations.description: Moving meditation and energy cultivation through the ancient art of Tai Chi.
